metadata.title: CVE-2021-25740 kubernetes: Endpoint & EndpointSlice permissions allow cross-Namespace forwarding (low)
metadata.description: MITIGATION: There is no patch for this issue, and it can currently only be mitigated by restricting access to the vulnerable features. The upstream Kubernetes mitigation applies equally to OpenShift, it is recommended to follow the mitigation steps in the upstream advisory to remove write access to Endpoints and EndpointSlices.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
openshift is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
